Reviews.Title: “Lovely friendly hotel, we would stay again without a doubt!”
Reviews.Author: debra m
Reviews.Content: actually booked stay albion house arrival melville street arrived 900am able book time gentleman reception courteous friendly reception immaculate looking onto garden argyle square lovely self space stay spotless clean beds comfortable nicely decorated location hotel perfect trains tube literally road kings cross main road stay doubt nice clean hotel helpful friendly staff top marks

Reviews.Title: “Nice Hotels - Good location”
Reviews.Author: Roberto M
Reviews.Content: everytime london book melville hotel excelsior hotel albion house hotel located wonderful square kings cross tube wonderful melville facing argyle square comfortable bed nice shower people friendly desk patrick soon

Reviews.Title: “My regular stays at Hotel Melville”

Reviews.Content: strongly recommend hotel business trips efficient ready time comfortable internet easy access staff friendly location perfect arriving kings cross stones throw station surrounded pubs bars restaurants

Reviews.Title: “Refurbished to high standard and very convenient for Eurostar and trips in London”

Reviews.Title: “The best things come in small packages...”
Reviews.Author: sarahNorwich86
Reviews.Content: booked albion house hotel staying albion week melville opinion designed pleasant bed comfortable difficulty getting morning modern clean bathroom staff friendly helpful road breakfast nicer hotel breakfasts isnt awfulthe nutella definitely giving brownie staff lovely price dont grumble

Reviews.Title: “Excellent budget Hotel”
Reviews.Author: ZishanA
Reviews.Content: impressed hotel reception bedrooms management job albeit clean nicely decorated free wifi wired access pleasant unexpected budget hotels dont free stayed 5 star hotel week charged 15usd 1 days happy free breakfast basic adequate suited alll liked hotel location utterly superb happy return time am london paid night including breakfast tax excellent london

Reviews.Title: “Not a single wink of sleep to be had...”

Reviews.Content: booked hotel single night eurostar departure following morning melville sister hotel road walked 8 flights steps unlucky 13 onto housing estate reminded sun hill bill tv series oh god shouting yelling screaming motorbikes noise en mass night outside window cant call call cupboard stinking mouldy shower yuk yuk yuk awful experience

Reviews.Content: booked hotel minute usual choices booked hence steep price tag budget hotel ignore past reviews hotel recently refurbished mine smart clean excellent bathroom comfy bed nice pillows refurbishment hasnt ground floor dont tired looking front door reception breakfast road albion hotel owners fairly basic expected budget hotel
